overview_of_class:
Physiology. Fundamental mechanisms underlying the function of the major organ systems in mammals will be covered. Emphasis will be placed on molecular and cellular mechanisms underlying physiological processes, and on the integration among the major organs systems to achieve homeostatic and sensorimotor function.
Topics will include neural, renal, cardiovascular, respiratory and autonomic/somatic motor physiology.
name: Physiology
subject: BIOL_SCI

overview_of_class: Mammalian physiology. Fundamental mechanisms underlying the function of the major organ systems in mammals will be covered. Emphasis will be placed on molecular and cellular mechanisms underlying physiological processes, and on the integration among the major organs systems to achieve homeostatic and sensorimotor function. Topics will include neural, renal, cardiovascular, respiratory, autonomic/somatic motor, and immunological physiology.
name: Physiology
subject: BIOL_SCI
